SCRIPT.MSCRI: : SET &VAR# = 1 : WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &VAR# = FORMAT(&VAR#,"0") : SET &UC4RB_UIP_JOB_ID# = &JOB_IDS#[&VAR#] : IF &UC4RB_UIP_JOB_ID# <> "-1" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_UIP_JOB_ID#,,"WORKFLOW" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_UIPATH.PRV.INCLUDE.GET_JOB_STATUS : P "Job Execution Id: &UC4RB_UIP_JOB_ID#, Job Status: '&UIPATH_JOB_STATUS#'" : IF "0" NE STR_FIND(&UC4RB_UIP_SUCCESS#,&UIPATH_JOB_STATUS#) : P "MESSAGE: Job completed successfully." : SET &SUCCESS_COUNT# = &SUCCESS_COUNT# + 1 : SET &COMPLETE_COUNT# = &COMPLETE_COUNT# + 1 : SET &JOB_IDS#[&VAR#] = "-1" : ELSE : IF "0" NE STR_FIND(&UC4RB_UIP_FAILURE#,&UIPATH_JOB_STATUS#) : P "ERROR: Job could not be completed successfully." : SET &COMPLETE_COUNT# = &COMPLETE_COUNT# + 1 : SET &JOB_IDS#[&VAR#] = "-1" : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : SET &VAR# = &VAR#+ 1 : ENDWHILE
